ABOUTINFO1: The entertainment industry in recent years has had a rapid development, advances in science and technology have given a solid base for many fields among them the beautiful arts have become widespread in all social strata.Given that places such as cinemas, due to their great diffusion and influx has become the meeting point for family, friends and casual, it is necessary to improve and systematize care for users, improving the experience and agility in the provision of services.
ABOUTINFO2: In addition, it has been shown that in recent years, there has been an increase in the audience in horror films, which is why Cinema Rock has been created, a special space focused on the category of suspense and terror of cinema, which incorporates the management of technological tools that improve the experience, control and treatment of information, thus achieving the capture and loyalty of users.
¿Por qué es bueno tener mi tarjeta premi: Why is it good to have my Cinema Rock premium card?
¿Qué requisitos debo tener para obtener: What requirements must I have to obtain my  Cinema Rock premium card?
La tarjeta Premium Cinema Rock le permit: The Premium Cinema Rock card allows all our users to receive benefits in our services, such as tickets to our functions with unmissable prices, discounts on the purchase of confectionery (without product exceptions) and for birthdays, tickets and free food on the day of the birthday For more information, visit our Premium Card section:
Debes ser mayor de edad (18 años) y real: You must be of legal age (18 years old) and make the purchase of your card which will be linked by means of a code to your account and ready you can enjoy all the benefits that we have prepared for you.
En nuestro cine manejamos funciones únic: In our theater we handle unique functions, so the functions you see on our page will be the only ones that will be presented. Check out the billboard section to see our features:
Queremos darle lo mejor a nuestros clien: We want to give our clients the best, that is why we stand out in projecting the best and most recent movies, so that our clients not only feel satisfied with our services but also with the movies they can watch. Check out the billboard section to see our features:
PARA NOSOTROS ES MUY IMPORTANTE TU OPINI: YOUR OPINION IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US
Nuestros clientes son nuestro mayor moti: Our customers are our greatest motivation to continue improving and become number one in the market. Therefore, if you have a complaint, claim, doubt or suggestion, you must enter all the fields below. You will have an answer as soon as possible and we will take it into account in our improvement plans in order to always give you the best service.
InformacionDePago: Remember that all your transactions are secure. Choose the method that best suits your needs
Tarjetas: You can pay with your credit card, debit card or cash payments. We handle the following means:
Bancos: Make your payment directly into our bank account by transfer or consignment. Your order will not be processed until the amount has been received in our account.
